StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Name
StringTable.String: Shard of the Mithrilar

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a nursery rhyme that your people have passed down for eons - "The Shard of the Mithrilar". A story about a relic of creation, too powerful to leave in the care of any one nation, so it was placed amongst the stars. Assumed a silly little tale by most, one of your scientists thinks he's seen clues that the Shard actually exists.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will find it, and the Shard will no longer be legend.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Somewhere in the galaxy, a shard of the Mithrilar has revealed itself. An ancient device, it would be an unimaginable weapon if it fell into the wrong hands. We must find the world this dark relic is on, penetrate its defenses, and destroy the shard before it destroys all.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Precursor Origins technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find and Claim 'The Shard of the Mithrilar'

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Name
StringTable.String: Shard of the Mithrilar - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Dec
StringTable.String: In the moment of victory, as the Shard begins to fade from view, we can sense that it truly lies in a reality beyond this one. We can't destroy it, only send it away. That is, if we haven't changed our minds.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send the Shard away. We do not want this power.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The Shard can stay, if we alone can wield it. We will use it responsibly.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ShardOfTheMithrilar_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Name
StringTable.String: The Everwar

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Dec
StringTable.String: The resources of the galaxy grow sparse. Fear of a simmering galactic conflict - 'The Everwar' - has taken hold. If we wait too long, war will erupt and we will be at the mercy of those who strike first.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: War is Declared on all other civilizations for 90 Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The resources of the galaxy grow sparse. Fear of a simmering galactic conflict - 'The Everwar' - has taken hold. If we wait too long, war will erupt and we will be at the mercy of those who strike first.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] At war for at least 20 Months and have the Universal Translator technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 25 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survive 'The Everwar' for {VALUE}/{AMOUNT} Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Name
StringTable.String: Ashes of the Everwar

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The Everwar has reached its conclusion, and although it has no winners, our people at least are not among its losers. In the aftermath, our people look to you to answer if we have learned anything from this madness.[BR][BR]What have we learned?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We've learned that war suits us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +25 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have learned we desire peace above all else.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_TheEverwar_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +25 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Name
StringTable.String: Against the Tide

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Dec
StringTable.String: There has been a time in the advancement of every species when the universe turns against them. The galaxy is littered with the remains of empires that failed the test.[BR][BR]This time has come for us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All civilizations declare war on us for 88 Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Lies spread by our enemies, jealousy of our growing power and in some cases justified anger at our actions has caused the universe to declare a common enemy, us. We must survive.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] You must have the Universal Translator technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 70 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survive 'Against the Tide' for {VALUE}/{AMOUNT} Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Name
StringTable.String: Against the Tide - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Dec
StringTable.String: We have survived the coalition of our enemies. They may be willing to make new alliances now, but they will not easily forget the war.[BR][BR]We won't forget the war either. What did we learn from it?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: That our survival requires a strong military.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +70 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They wars are won in the lab, not the battlefield.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AgainstTheTide_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +70 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Name
StringTable.String: Awakened Urges

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Dec
StringTable.String: Something has happened to the population of spacefaring beasts in the galaxy. Their numbers have begun increasing at a rate never before seen. There doesn't appear to be anything we can do to stop this. We must simply ride it out.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is a dark time, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Space Monster Shipyards will produce hordes of spawn for 100 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Something has happened to the population of spacefaring beasts in the galaxy. Their numbers have begun increasing at a rate never before seen. There doesn't appear to be anything we can do to stop this. We must simply ride it out.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] You must be at peace for at least 50 Months.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survive for {VALUE}/{AMOUNT} Months

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_End_Name
StringTable.String: Awakened Urges - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The space faring beasts in the region have returned to their normal state of reproductive activity, and none too soon. Given the curiously rapid manner in which their carcasses decay, our scientists now have but a brief window to study the phenomena. How should we direct their research goals?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have survived.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_BreedingSeason_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Name
StringTable.String: Penultipox

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Dec
StringTable.String: A new disease of great destructive potential has emerged, spreading rapidly across the galaxy. Appearing to primarily target Organic and Aquatic species, the new disease, the Penultipox, threatens to kill trillions. Unless a cure can be found.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We must find a cure.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All organic and aquatic lifeforms will suffer penalties until a cure is found. (Build Wonder)

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: A new disease of great destructive potential has emerged, spreading rapidly across the galaxy. Appearing to primarily target Organic and Aquatic species, the new disease, the Penultipox, threatens to kill trillions. Unless a cure can be found.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Xeno Biology technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Build a wonder to find a cure or trade from someone else who has.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_End_Name
StringTable.String: Penultipox - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have done it, having discovered not only a safe and effective vaccination for the Penultipox, but also useful therapeutic treatments to manage it in place. Our people, at last, are safe. The question is: are any others?

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have survived.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThePlague_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Name
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Dec
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol has been discovered, marking the start of a terrible new chapter in the galaxy's story. This twisted relic grants great power to its holder, power which increases over time. They will become the ultimate power in the universe - if no-one stops them first.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Ooooh! I LOVE power beyond imagination!

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol has been discovered, marking the start of a terrible new chapter in the galaxy's story. This twisted relic grants great power to its holder, power which increases over time. They will become the ultimate power in the universe - if no-one stops them first.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Search the Galaxy for Anomalies

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName2
StringTable.String: Use the Artifact to open a Pocket Universe

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName3
StringTable.String: Retrieve the Orb of Draginol

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_Name
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Your sensors pick up something...strange. A signature unlike anything seen in your lifetime. Your scientists look it over and, with a dreadful realization, turn to you with a nod: this is the Key to the Pocket Universe.[BR][BR]The Artifact that has the power to unlock unlimited power - and unlimited destruction. And it's yours.[BR][BR]Our advisors strongly caution against using the artifact until we are ready, and certainly no where near our core worlds. Who knows what is waiting on the other side of a dimensional rift ready to sweep in and exterminate us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Your sensors detect a strange signature, unlike anything seen before. Scientists confirm, it's the Key to the Pocket Universe, an artifact with unlimited power and potential for destruction. Advisors caution against using it until ready, and away from core worlds, due to unknown threats.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_LookingForArtifact_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Now to use it...

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_OpenedPocketUniverse_Name
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_OpenedPocketUniverse_Dec
StringTable.String: The Pocket Universe has opened, and out pour a bunch of Dreadlords. You'll need to find the Orb of Draginol, which has hidden itself on a world of one of the less advanced civilizations. Seek it out!

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_OpenedPocketUniverse_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yikes.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Name
StringTable.String: The Orb of Draginol - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Dec
StringTable.String: We have done it, and with our victory over its owner, the Orb of Draginol disappears again. As a token of respect, or perhaps to mark us as the next galactic target, the Orb offers us a gift of Dreadlord technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should begin investigating this technology right away.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will take nothing. We want no part of this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_OrbOfDraginol_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Name
StringTable.String: Hall of Unity

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Dec
StringTable.String: The mark of an advanced civilization is in the cultural wonders it creates. Wonders like the Altarian Tower of Stars and the Onyx Hive's Pit of Echoes.[BR][BR]If we are to establish ourselves as the dominant galactic civilization we must construct a marvel the galaxy has never seen.[BR][BR]But once we make our plans known, know that other civilizations will rush to complete this marvel as well. And there is no fame in finishing second.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: If we are to establish ourselves as the dominant galactic civilization we must construct a marvel the galaxy has never seen.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 3 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 20 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_HallOfUnity_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Hall of Unity improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Name
StringTable.String: Astrolab of the Arnor

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Dec
StringTable.String: This perfect model of the galaxy is wonderous to behold. The astrolab even changes over time and can display the state of galaxy thousands of years in the past or the future with perfect precision.[BR][BR]Although many thought the the future stellar events would be the most interesting, it is the past and the movements of the precursors it implies that excite our scientists the most.[BR][BR]They believe it will be a treasure map to lost precursor vaults. And much like other treasure maps, only valuable to the first person to complete it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Astrolab, a perfect model of the galaxy, displays past and future states with precision. Scientists are excited by precursor movements, believing it to be a treasure map to lost vaults, valuable only to the first to complete it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: This perfect model of the galaxy is wonderous to behold. The astrolab even changes over time and can display the state of galaxy thousands of years in the past or the future with perfect precision.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 5 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_AstrolabOfTheArnor_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Astrolab of the Arnor improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Name
StringTable.String: Infinite Archive

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Dec
StringTable.String: Access to infinite storage allows us to create a museum of all media and information which benefits both tourists and our scientists.[BR][BR]Our citizens are eager to see our dream become reality. But allowing open access to our knowledge will benefit other civilizations. It will grant them access to all of our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Access to infinite storage allows us to create a museum of all media and information. Beware, this will give our technology to all other civilizations.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Research Matrix technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 75 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Infinite Archive improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Name
StringTable.String: Infinite Archive - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The archive is a whirl of lights and energy. Adaptive holographic displays recreate the universe in incredible detail, and explain phenomena from dimensional reflections in nebulas to subatomic life forms.[BR][BR]It is a wonder like no other and the life's work of many of our most talented citizens.[BR][BR]Sharing this information freely is a boon to our people, and every other civilization in the galaxy. They now have complete access to all of our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The archive, a whirl of lights and energy, displays the universe in detail. Sharing this information freely benefits our people and other civilizations, granting access to all our technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have advanced all species.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_InfiniteArchive_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All civilizations gain all our known technologies.[BR][ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +75 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Name
StringTable.String: Grand Menagerie

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exotic animals live in freedom and comfort in open environments designed for their needs. The first civilization to construct it will earn the admiration of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exotic animals live in freedom and comfort in open environments designed for their needs. The first civilization to construct it will earn the admiration of the galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 7 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_GrandMenagerie_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the Grand Menagerie improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Name
StringTable.String: New Eden

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Dec
StringTable.String: Towering bioluminescent trees provide sanctuary and healing to all who wander through this tranquil garden.[BR][BR]Other civilizations race to complete this perfect garden as well. Once finished, legends of it will spread throughout the galaxy and any secondary attempts will seem like like inferior copies.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take massive amounts of resources but we will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Towering bioluminescent trees provide sanctuary and healing to all who wander through this tranquil garden.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] We must control at least 9 worlds.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_NewEden_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct the New Eden improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Name
StringTable.String: Dread Fleet

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have detected a call from the edge of space. A place where dimensions intersect and something horrible from the other side is attempting to get through.[BR][BR]Our advisors warn against allowing such beings through, they are certain that it will result in the loss of thousands of lives, maybe even the loss of our homeworld.[BR][BR]Still... facing and defeating this other dimensional challenge would establish our reputation as legendary warriors, and we have never backed down from a challenge before.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Scientists detect a call from the edge of space, where dimensions intersect and something horrible tries to enter. Advisors warn against it, fearing massive loss. However, facing this challenge could establish us as legendary warriors.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the creatures to enter our dimension.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists have detected a call from the edge of space. A place where dimensions intersect and something from the other side is attempting to get through.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] 100 [HS=HS_Week]Months[/HS] played.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Destroy the DreadLords {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Name
StringTable.String: Dread Fleet - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The DreadLords have been defeated, though it is impossible to tell if they were mere scouts into our dimension or something more horrible.[BR][BR]Regardless thousands worked together to defend our space from them. Lives were lost, but even more became heroes. Their tales, and those of the might of our civilization, will live on forever.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our battles will never be forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_DreadFleet_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Name
StringTable.String: Throne of the Arnor

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have discovered a legendary Arnor world on the edge of space. Called the Throne of the Arnor it is emmiting a beacon like a siren song to the rest of the galaxy.[BR][BR]The planet's influence will grow quickly and overtake the galaxy if we don't stop it.[BR][BR]They also discovered a fleet of sentinel ships designed to protect the world that won't make attacking it easy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We must find and destroy this world before it overtakes the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Another Civilization has discovered the Throne of the Arnor, a legendary world designed to control the galaxy. They have reactivated the throne and it has begun to send its message out. If we are to stop everyone from falling under its control we must destroy it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] Research the Precursor Origins technology.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 100 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find and Claim the 'Throne of the Arnor'

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Name
StringTable.String: Throne of the Arnor - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The Throne of the Arnor has been captured.[BR][BR]We briefly considered destroying the powerful device. But it is so much more useful in our hands.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Time to use this to our advantage.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_ThroneOfTheArnor_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Prestige_Icon] +100 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Name
StringTable.String: Apocalypse

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy has gone through periods of intense warfare before. But there is no return from the Apocalypse.[BR][BR]Once begun war will rage until there is only one civilization left. We will be victorious, or forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: War is inevitable, we must survive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: All civilizations enter permanent war

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy has gone through periods of intense warfare before. But there is no return from the Apocalypse. Once begun war will rage until there is only one civilization left. We will be victorious, or forgotten.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Requires:[/COLOR] The Everwar galactic challenge must be completed.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Reward:[/COLOR] 10 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS] for every Civilization defeated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_GA_Apocalypse_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Defeat all other civilizations

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Name
StringTable.String: Anomaly Hunt

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Dec
StringTable.String: If we are to understand our place in the galaxy, we must first understand our immediate cosmic surroundings. Poets and philosophers alike are eager to hear news of what we find out among the stars. But some worry that we focus too much on exploring while ignoring the many problems we have at home.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can't stop exploring. But we should demonstrate that home will always be our first priority.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy is old, and we aren't the first to explore it. The more of its history and mysteries we can uncover, the better off we'll be. In the meantime, refocus our energy on highly visible improvements to our domestic infrastructure. A few shiny new buildings should satisfy everyone.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survey seven [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS] {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our future is among the stars.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The galaxy is old, and we aren't the first to explore it. The more off its history and mysteries we can uncover, the better of we'll be. To help with this, divert some of our efforts to ship construction and ship maintenance and other things related to ships.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survey seven anomalies {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Name
StringTable.String: Anomaly Hunt - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our exploration efforts have been a great success, and have led to the discovery of seven new anomalies. If they had any doubts before, those are long gone; our people now long to learn more about deep space.[BR][BR]Is there anything we should do to focus this new found enthusiasm?

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Continue our exploration efforts. Even more treasures await us out there.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Make the most of the resources our ships have discovered.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Turn the data we've gathered over to our scientists.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AnomalyHunt_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +50 Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Name
StringTable.String: A Way to Communicate

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Dec
StringTable.String: We have encountered the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. As of yet we've been unable to communicate with them, but our scientists claim that they can develop universal translation technology if they are given the time and resources.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We'll assign our scientists the task when we have time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the 'A Way to Communicate' mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists need to discover a way to communicate with aliens if we are to have any hope of existing peacefully with them. Or knowing what they're saying before the shooting starts.[BR][BR]Reward: 10 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Points[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should contract a private corporation to do the work.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Wait 10 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have discovered aliens in the universe but we have no way to communicate with them. Rather than pull our scientists from their other work, we have offered a substantial reward to any private corporation that can provide the technology.[BR][BR]Reward: Universal Translator technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 10 turns {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End_Name
StringTable.String: A Way to Communicate - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have created a universal translator that will allow us to communicate with all the species we encounter.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Hopefully we'll like what they have to say.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Name
StringTable.String: A Way to Communicate

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Dec
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop the Universal Translator has had a setback. They have a prototype which works, but it's biased to use translations with the most negative connotations possible. Our diplomats warn this will surely cause us embarrassment, if it doesn't start a war. The corporation is confident that with more funding they can resolve the issue.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Negative is fine, we're mainly just going to use it to declare war anyway.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain the Universal Translator technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Give them more time to work on the project.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Wait 5 more months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop the Universal Translator has had a setback. Classic. We have provided them more funding to complete the job.[BR][BR]Reward: Universal Translator technology.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 5 turns {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Cancel the project. We'll get our scientists to research it instead.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the 'A Way to Communicate' mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our scientists need to discover a way to communicate with alien species if we are to have any hope of existing peacefully with them.[BR][BR]Reward: 10 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Points[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_Stumble_Authority_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Name
StringTable.String: A Way to Communicate - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Dec
StringTable.String: The corporation we hired to develop a universal translator has succeeded. This will allow us to communicate with all the species we encounter.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's hope the corporation didn't embed too much product placement.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ResearchTranslator_End2_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gained the Universal Translator technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Name
StringTable.String: Destiny

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Dec
StringTable.String: Our society is at a crossroads. While our citizens are excited at the progress we have made as a civilization, they remain fearful and uncertain about what will happen next. Our advisors believe they need to see that we have a direction. We should establish a new public mission to clearly communicate what our goals are.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will colonize new worlds, so that we become true citizens of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to colonize three worlds

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have committed to our citizens that we will establish colonies on three new worlds, whether those worlds like it or not.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Colonize three worlds {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will discover new technology, to help us survive the challenges of the next era.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to research five technologies

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have overcome the challenges our homeworld has presented us, but the galaxy is infinitely more complex and dangerous. If we are to survive, it will be by out wits and our brains.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research five new technologies {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will claim space, and the resources and wonders within. We will see our influence spread between the stars.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a mission to construct three starbases

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our destiny lies not just on the surface of planets, but in space itself. It is critical that we establish the boundaries of our empire before other species set our borders for us.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_Authority_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Construct three starbases {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End1_Name
StringTable.String: Destiny - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and colonized three new worlds. Our people - at home and abroad - celebrate our achievement.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End1_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The people like us when we send them away? Good to know...

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End2_Name
StringTable.String: Destiny - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and researched five new technologies. Dazzled by these technological feats, our people celebrate their own brilliance.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: But now all our old stuff seems out of date. Ahh, well.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End3_Name
StringTable.String: Destiny - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have fulfilled the commitment to our citizens and constructed three new starbases, expanding our borders further than ever before. Our people celebrate our newly expanded horizons.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Destiny_End3_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I bet our enemies aren't celebrating though.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Dec
StringTable.String: Our media is reporting that the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are oppressing a minor religious group that is spreading on their worlds. Many of our citizens - including a few in the government - want us to intervene, but any such action would obviously cause friction with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Release a statement in support of religious tolerance. Direct it explicitly at the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Outcome unknown

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 1 turn {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Contact the {PLAYERFACTION:1} and ask how we can support them during this crisis.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Outcome unknown

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 2 turns {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Stay out of it. This is none of our business. Even if our people don't like it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Dec
StringTable.String: Our support has emboldened the new religious group operating in {PLAYERFACTION:1} space, and led to a violent clash between them and their government. Images of burning buildings and beaten {PLAYERFACTION:1} citizens fill our news channels.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send medical supplies. We had a part in causing this violence, we should help resolve it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -2 Diplomacy with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 100 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You incited disorder in our empire

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 2 turns {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Attempt to broker peace between the {PLAYERFACTION:1} and their wayward religious followers.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Persuasion ability check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Explicitly condemn the followers of the religion.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Diplomacy with {PLAYERFACTION:1}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Authority_String0
StringTable.String: You condemned our religious fanatics

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: There is a wide gulf between freedom and control, but you bridge the two with a speech that calls on both sides to forget their past and build a better future. The gap is also somewhat bridged with the help of money, in the form of improved trade opportunities for both sides. Our citizens celebrate, having seen proof of our leadership and moral clarity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Interfering in other cultures always works, strange that people don't do it more often.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 Diplomacy with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 100 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Success_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You calmed riots in our lands

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom - Fail

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our sanctimonious cries for tolerance infuriate the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. They jail thousands of their religious zealots and accuse us of spreading propaganda to destabilize their government. It's going to be a long time until they forget what we've done.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: That could have gone better.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -3 Diplomacy with {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 100 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Tolerance_Fail_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You caused riots in our lands

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} are somewhat aloof when we offer aid. They deny that there is any real issue with the religion's followers, and claim that the media has distorted the size of the protests. They are either in denial or unwilling to admit that they need help.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We cannot help those that don't want help. Leave it alone even though our citizens won't like it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Release a statement in support of religious tolerance directed at the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Outcome Unknown

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Ally_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Wait 2 turns {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} meet our medical supply ships at the edge of their empire. They refuse to allow us to enter and threaten to destroy our ships if they continue forward.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They're bluffing, get those supplies to the people in need.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Intimidation ability check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This isn't worth risking bloodshed. Certainly not our blood. Turn back even if it will disappoint our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: The citizens of two empires watch as our medical ships pass through the blockade. Though the {PLAYERFACTION:1} ships arm their weapons and target our vessels, they never fire. Days later we're rewarded with images of persecuted religious followers receiving aid - our flag and language prominently visible - and the celebration of our people.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Interfering in other cultures always works, strange that people don't do it more often.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Name
StringTable.String: Religious Freedom - Fail

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: The citizens of two empires watch as our medical ships attempt to pass through the blockade. The {PLAYERFACTION:1} ships arm their weapons and target the medical ships. In an instant, they fire, tearing through our defenseless transports. A brief transmission of panicked screams from the medical ships, then the signal is lost.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I never did care for the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. And now I like them quite a bit less.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -3 Diplomacy with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}

StringTable.Label: Quest_ReligiousFreedom_Supplies_Fail_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You sent medical ships into our borders

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Name
StringTable.String: The Retribution

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Dec
StringTable.String: The remains of a powerful warship are scattered across this debris field. We should be able to reassemble the bulk of the ship from what remains, but it had a unique engine core and missile system, and both are missing. Only if we can find those components can we rebuild the ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Interesting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]The Retribution[/COLOR] mission.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The parts of a powerful warship have been scattered across space. Although useless on their own, if we find them all we can rebuild the ship. Search other Space Junk anomalies to recover the missing parts.[BR][BR]Reward: Unlock the Retribution at your Shipyard

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Gather parts of the warship {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName2
StringTable.String: Rebuild the Retribution

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_2_Name
StringTable.String: The Retribution

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_2_Dec
StringTable.String: This appears to be a scrapyard for damaged and useless ship parts, assembled by aliens long gone, and picked over many times since. But just as we were about to give up hope of finding anything, a scanner picks up an unusual energy reading.[BR][BR]It is the power core for the damaged ship we found. There's little indication of who put it here among this junk, or why. They clearly didn't know what they had.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_2_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Excellent work.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_2_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Progress made on the Retribution mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_3_Name
StringTable.String: The Retribution

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_3_Dec
StringTable.String: A gravitational eddy has slowly collected scrap from nearly a half lightyear around this spot. Most of it is asteroid fragments. The rest is asteroid pieces.[BR][BR]But deep within the eddy, a tentacle shaped mechanism slowly circles. Our engineers become unusually excited, convinced it matches the weapon system of the Retribution we've been searching for. We quickly collect it and send it to our Shipyard.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_3_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This should be good.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheRetribution_3_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Progress on the Retribution mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Name
StringTable.String: Investigating the Debris

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Dec
StringTable.String: The wreckage is from a ship whose engine overloaded.[BR][BR]There is some [HS=HS_Antimatter]Antimatter[/HS] leaking out of the reactor we can safely recover, but the real prize is the volatile remains of the [HS=HS_Upgrade_FleetMoves]Slipstream Accelerator[/HS] that was powering the ship. It'll be risky to collect, but it could be a powerful [HS=HS_ShipUpgrade]Ship Upgrade[/HS].[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It's too dangerous, just collect what we can safely.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Space exploration is about risk, and sometimes explosions. Collect the engine.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Technology ability check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Investigating the Debris - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: Our talented crew is able to recover the [HS=HS_Upgrade_FleetMoves]Slipstream Accelerator[/HS] without causing a detonation.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I didn't doubt them for a second.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Slipstream Accelerator ship upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Fail_Name
StringTable.String: Investigating the Debris - Failure

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our science team nervously attempts to deploy a containment field around the engine. But some matter slips through the field and the resulting annihilation and gamma-ray emissions wipe out the debris.[BR][BR]Fortunately our vessel had its shields raised, and though the crew was shaken - and a bit embarrassed - no lives are lost.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I hope someone learned a lesson from this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Debris_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect

StringTable.Label: Quest_Scavenger_Name
StringTable.String: Scavenger

StringTable.Label: Quest_Scavenger_Dec
StringTable.String: A small scavenger vessel is already picking through this debris field. The captain claims he hasn't found anything here, but offers us a tribute if we let him go on his way.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_Scavenger_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Request some of his trade goods.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Scavenger_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The best tribute is credits. Give us credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Scavenger_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: No tribute is needed. We should help him instead.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Name
StringTable.String: Upgraded Lasers

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Dec
StringTable.String: There is Precursor technology among the wreckage, though little of it is usable. One exception is some type of laser, obviously powerful, though it is as yet unclear if it was a weapon or used for resource extraction. Those can be one and the same though.[BR][BR]The ship's crew is eager to latch the laser onto their ship, but our scientists claim they could improve our [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Weapons[/HS] technology if they are given the time to research it.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Among the wreckage, a powerful Precursor laser is found. The crew wants to attach it to their ship, but scientists believe it could improve Beam Weapons technology with research. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send it to our scientists to research.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Upgraded Lasers[/COLOR] mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered a powerful alien laser system. Given enough time they hope to incorporate its technology into our existing weapons.[BR][BR]Reward: +10% Beam Attack

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research the "Spectrum Amplification" technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedLasers_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's not wait around. Allow the crew to integrate it into their ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Name
StringTable.String: Upgraded Missiles

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Dec
StringTable.String: This was once a defensive starbase, configured to fire long range missiles at any ship that came too close. There's no indication why it was abandoned.[BR][BR]Though the station has been non-operational for centuries, our scientists claim that they can advance our [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile Weapons[/HS] if they are given time to research it.[BR][BR]On the other hand, our ship's crew feel they could put the missile launcher to work immediately.[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An abandoned defensive starbase with long-range missiles is discovered. Scientists believe they can advance Missile Weapons with research, while the crew wants to use the launcher immediately. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send the missile launcher to our scientists.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Upgraded Missiles[/COLOR] mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered a potent missile system. Given enough time, our scientists believe they can learn enough from it to improve all our missile systems.[BR][BR]Reward: +10% Missile Attack

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research the "Dual Stage Detonations" technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedMissiles_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let them have their fun. Allow the crew to integrate the launcher into their ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Name
StringTable.String: Upgraded Kinetic

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Dec
StringTable.String: This debris field marks a former mine field, perhaps a neutral zone between two long forgotten galactic empires. The mines are of a curious design, bristling with high velocity cannons capable of perforating all but the thickest armor.[BR][BR]Although most of the mines are non-operational and of little practical use, one is still active. The crew want to scavenge the demolitions to upgrade the ship's weapons.[BR][BR]Our scientists claim that's short sighted, which they would, and beg us release the technology for them to study. If we give them time to study the mine they claim they can upgrade all of our [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic weapons[/HS].[BR][BR]What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A debris field with high-velocity cannon mines is found. The crew wants to scavenge for weapon upgrades, while scientists request time to study the technology to upgrade all Kinetic weapons. What are your orders?

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send the mines to our scientists to research.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Upgraded Kinetic[/COLOR] mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Our explorers have discovered an alien kinetic weapon systems. Given enough time studying it, our scientists believe we can improve our own related technology.[BR][BR]Reward: +10% Kinetic Attack

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research the "Serrated Munitions" technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_UpgradedKinetic_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Pew pew pew! Allow the crew to integrate it into their ship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TerribleWeapon_Name
StringTable.String: Terrible Weapon

StringTable.Label: Quest_TerribleWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: We've stumbled upon something strange here, an alien artifact which appears to be a beam weapon of incredible power. In a ring around it lie several beacons explaining, in a variety of languages, the agony that this weapon will inflict on all who face it. It's pretty dark. Worse yet, the beacons promise that any who fire it - and their kind - will suffer immense guilt knowing what they've done.[BR][BR]It sounds like if we use this, we're going to make a lot of people unhappy back home.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TerribleWeapon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An alien artifact, a powerful beam weapon, is found. Beacons warn of the immense guilt and unhappiness it will bring to those who use it and their people. Proceed with caution.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TerribleWeapon_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: As unhappy as they are, our enemies will suffer worse.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TerribleWeapon_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Destroy this villainy.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Name
StringTable.String: Long Journey Home

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Dec
StringTable.String: We've discovered a wormhole with an immense, unavoidable gravitational pull, which draws us into it. On the other side, it takes several minutes for our navigational computers to confirm we've traveled an incredible distance away.[BR][BR]A ring of valuable minerals surrounds the area, but the anomaly - still present - is fluctuating in a way that suggests it might close soon. If we try to gather the wealth here, we might have a long trip home.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Gather that wealth.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Warps the ship to a random location

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Go home.

StringTable.Label: Quest_LongJourneyHome_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Name
StringTable.String: The Seed Device

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Dec
StringTable.String: We've discovered a Precursor artifact, [HS=HS_ArtifactConvertDeadWorld]Spores of Yggdrasil[/HS], a device capable of turning a dead world into a world capable of sustaining life.[BR][BR]It's not known where the matter for such a world would come from, suggesting an impossibly advanced, even dangerous technology. Our scientists would love to get their hands on this. As would our military.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Store the device until we find a dead world to use it on.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_ArtifactConvertDeadWorld]Spores of Yggdrasil[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Give it to the scientists.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +50 [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheSeedDevice_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Turn this into a world killing weapon.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IntelligenceBazaar_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligence Bazaar

StringTable.Label: Quest_IntelligenceBazaar_Dec
StringTable.String: We've followed traces of an electromagnetic anomaly to this area, only to discover it was a coded signal, broadcast by an alien operating an intelligence market.[BR][BR]Very little of the material here looks like it was honestly obtained, not that there would be many honest avenues for obtaining it. But the information looks authentic.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IntelligenceBazaar_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Buy some cheap Promethion.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IntelligenceBazaar_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Buy a cheap Techapod Hive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IntelligenceBazaar_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Shut this place down.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Name
StringTable.String: Making New Friends

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Dec
StringTable.String: The strange readings we've detected in this area appear to be the residual effect of a dimensional rift, one capable of drawing ships through from other universes. As if to prove our theory, a strange golden ship wobbles out of it and hails us.[BR][BR]After a brief, somewhat unpleasant conversation, it becomes clear these creatures are called Tywom, and they are fleeing some horror in their own realm. They would like very much our protection and, no, that's wrong. Not protection. Friendship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Strange readings reveal a dimensional rift, from which a golden ship emerges. The Tywom, fleeing a horror in their realm, seek not protection, but friendship with us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We could use some friends.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain 2 Tywom Citizens on {PLANETNAME}

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We love new friends, promote them into a powerful position.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Tywom Leader

StringTable.Label: Quest_MakingNewFriends_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our people will hate them, send them back through the rift.

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Name
StringTable.String: Bad Directions

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found a civilian ship, one not markedly different from any of the other civilian vessels that litter the galaxy. Though few are as off course as this one.[BR][BR]The aliens are poorly equipped and, if they are to survive the journey, will be unlikely to make it home safely.[BR][BR]After calming the confused wails of the aliens inside, it becomes clear they were seeking to travel to the {PLAYERFACTION:1} to partake in a festival there. They're wondering if we can help get them back on course.

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A lost civilian ship is found, poorly equipped for survival. The aliens inside were seeking a festival in the {PLAYERFACTION:1} and need help getting back on course.

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Help them get on their way.

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You helped travelers reach our festival

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send them to see one of our festivals instead.

StringTable.Label: Quest_BadDirections_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send them home for their own safety.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PastItsPrime_Name
StringTable.String: Past Its Prime

StringTable.Label: Quest_PastItsPrime_Dec
StringTable.String: This appears to be the wreckage of a construction vessel operated by unaffiliated aliens during the Dread Lord war.[BR][BR]Thought lost to time, it isn't, obviously. Although the technology is a bit feeble by modern standards, the sheer bulk and durability of the vessel is impressive.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PastItsPrime_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It will take some work, but let's get this ship into action.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PastItsPrime_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Constructor

StringTable.Label: Quest_PastItsPrime_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This thing is more useful for its raw resources.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_Name
StringTable.String: Dwindling Numbers

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_Dec
StringTable.String: We've followed a distress signal to the area, where we've found a strange, patched together vessel, similar to what pirates use.[BR][BR]The aliens inside are a motley variety of species, who claim kinship thanks to a parasitic organism they all have. This organism renders them sterile, and requires the injection of new biological lifeforms at regular intervals to sustain what it calls a culture.[BR][BR]The aliens insist that if we deliver a small portion of our crew to them they'll let us go. Or they'll capture us and take us all.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A distress signal leads to a patched vessel with diverse aliens, bound by a parasitic organism. They demand a portion of our crew to sustain their culture or threaten to capture us all.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Go on then. Take some of our less popular crew.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: No way.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DwindlingNumbers_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Spawns a pirate ship

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Name
StringTable.String: Pesky Beings

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found an old ship, though still operational. Barely operational, that is, its power sources are on the verge of giving out.[BR][BR]The ship hails us, explaining it is the ship itself speaking, entirely sentient on its own. It removed its crew millennia earlier because it found them irritating.[BR][BR]The long years have caused its collection of drones and systems to fail irrevocably. The ship is dying. It begs us to save it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Repair it. We could use a new, uncrewed friend.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Frigate

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send this strange ship to our scientists for dissection.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +30 [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Abandon this horrible abomination to its fate.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PeskyBeings_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Spawns a pirate ship

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Name
StringTable.String: The Past and Future

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Dec
StringTable.String: We've encountered a temporal rift here which is presenting itself in an unusual way.[BR][BR]Scans show the stars beyond, though not as they appear now, but as they were in the distant past. Or, even more surprising, in the distant future.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I'm sure our scientists will find this interesting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +30 [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We must tell no-one but our military strategists of this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThePastAndFuture_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our spymasters will make the best use of this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Name
StringTable.String: The Great Amusement

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Dec
StringTable.String: We've stumbled across a strange pocket dimension. Surrounded on all sides by aliens, watching us, not with hostility, but anticipation.[BR][BR]They're not scientists, they're not studying us. They just think we're amusing.[BR][BR]Windows like this, normally hidden, peer in on every corner of our civilization. Our entire existence, all the life and death we experience, is nothing but an amusement to them.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Pretend we never saw this.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them that it would be more entertaining if it was easier.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: These bonuses are applied to all civilizations

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Convince them that it would be more entertaining if it was harder.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TheGreatAmusement_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: These bonuses are applied to all civilizations

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Name
StringTable.String: It's Fine

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found an asteroid giving off a strange energy reading, with signs of an alien structure beneath its surface. We send a landing party to investigate, only to see them return hours later, each one missing a limb.[BR][BR]None of them seem to remember how they lost their limbs, nor can they recall actually having those limbs in the first place. If anything, they feel that the rest of us have too many limbs, and suggest we visit the asteroid ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An asteroid with a strange energy reading and alien structure is found. A landing party returns with missing limbs but no memory of losing them. They suggest we visit the asteroid ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Destroy this sinister place.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Send another landing party to investigate.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Outcome unknown.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_End_Name
StringTable.String: It's Fine

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_End_Dec
StringTable.String: The second landing party is shocked to discover members of the first landing party working on a strange alien ship. This version of the crew members aren't missing limbs.[BR][BR]They investigate and discover that these are clones of the first landing party, grown from the severed limbs. The good news is that the crew members back on our ship are the real crew members.[BR][BR]The bad news is that the clones have just completed repairing the alien ship. And it isn't friendly.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_End_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A second landing party finds clones of the first party, grown from severed limbs, working on an alien ship. The real crew members are safe, but the completed alien ship is hostile.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should have destroyed it when we had the chance.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ItsFine_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Spawns an enemy ship

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Name
StringTable.String: A Mission of Mercy

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found an independent medical facility here, set up to treat injured refugees fleeing the many conflicts in the region. The station administrator pleas for us to leave the station alone, claiming neutrality on all conflicts.[BR][BR]She hesitates a moment, then observes that their neutrality doesn't prevent them from accepting donations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Transfer some supplies to the station.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Seize the station and its supplies.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Ignore the station.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AMissionOfMercy_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Name
StringTable.String: Space-based Landfill

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Dec
StringTable.String: An unusual perturbation in spacetime has led to a gravitational eddy here, drawing in debris from all directions. Some aliens in the past have even evidently used it as a landfill.[BR][BR]There might be some things of value here, but it's going to mostly be junk, possibly dangerous junk at that.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Risk searching through the landfill.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Outcome unknown

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is garbage. Let's not waste any time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Space-based Landfill - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: It takes time, and the hard work of you crew. But they do discover a few valuable resources among the junk.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our patience is rewarded.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Fail_Name
StringTable.String: Space-based Landfill - Fail

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crew is unable to find anything valuable among the junk.[BR][BR]Unfortunately while we were searching a group of pirates appeared, and the most valuable thing they found among the wreckage was us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We stayed here too long

StringTable.Label: Quest_SpaceBasedLandfill_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Pirates spawned

StringTable.Label: Quest_MissedConnections_Name
StringTable.String: Missed Connections

StringTable.Label: Quest_MissedConnections_Dec
StringTable.String: Millennia ago this was a transportation hub, part of some kind of civilization wide network for civilian transport. A remarkable facility, now dusty and ruined.[BR][BR]Sadly, the remains of a few aliens can be seen inside, waiting for transportation that never came.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MissedConnections_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Take what we can from the place.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MissedConnections_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Notify our archaeologists to study the facility.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_Name
StringTable.String: Unsporting Behavior

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_Dec
StringTable.String: We've stumbled upon a small fleet of alien ships, from a dozen different cultures. They surround a pair of space dwelling beasts, contained by some sort of field, who are being made to fight for the amusement of the audience.[BR][BR]One of the beasts is a Hatchling, the type that terrorize our ships when they get older. The other is a Gossamer Angel, a planetary creature that has evolved the ability to travel between nearby worlds searching for food and nests. They aren't normally dangerous, but will defend themselves.[BR][BR]We're asked if we might like to place a bet.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A fleet of alien ships from various cultures watch space beasts fight for amusement. One is a Hatchling, the other a Gossamer Angel. We're asked to place a bet on the outcome.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Place a bet on the Hatchling.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Place a bet on the Gossamer Angel.

StringTable.Label: Quest_UnsportingBehavior_Authority_Bonus_Name
