And we do not wish to wait for your civilization to crumble before we have the opportunity to investigate it.[BR][BR]If we provide the location, will you agree to provide the information you find with us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We discovered a precursor archive within your borders. You may not find it without our help. If we provide the location, will you agree to share the information you find with us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will share what we find with you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We won't share anything with you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_Equality_String0
StringTable.String: You wouldn't share the archive

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Name
StringTable.String: Archive Location

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Dec
StringTable.String: We discover the precursor archive exactly where the {PLAYERFACTION:1} said it would be.[BR][BR]It is little more than rubble from consistent meteor storms. Little of value remains. But our search team is able to recover some resources which can be sold for a considerable profit and our scientists are able to put together some schematics from the archive's design.[BR][BR]According to our agreement with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} we should split the resources with them and share the research we gained. But do we really want to do that?

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Provide a copy of the information and half the resources to the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 turns[BR]+60 Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You shared the precursor archive

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Share the research but lie about finding any resources.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 turns[BR]+60 Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Equality_String0
StringTable.String: You shared the precursor archive

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Keep it all for ourselves.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 turns[BR]+60 Research

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArchiveLocation_End_Authority_String0
StringTable.String: You refused to share the precursor archive

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Dec
StringTable.String: One of our leading scientists was killed in deep space. We don't know who killed him, or why he was outside our borders.[BR][BR]If you find any evidence as you survey [HS=HS_Anomaly]anomalies[/HS] it is the {PLAYERFACTION:1} property. We expect it to be given to us without being examined by your teams.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will review what we find first, then decide if we are going to turn it over.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Investigation[/COLOR] Mission[BR]-1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You didn't agree to turn over the evidence

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have been asked to explore anomalies around their borders to find evidence of a murder.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find evidence of the attack {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will fully support your investigation.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission[BR]+1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Equality_String0
StringTable.String: You agreed to support our investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Equality_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: Explore anomalies and attempt to find evidence of a murder.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Equality_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Find evidence of the attack {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation Evidence

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Dec
StringTable.String: We found the {PLAYERFACTION:1} wreckage among the anomalies as well as a data capsule. It may be a recording of that attack or valuable information.[BR][BR]The survey team is prepared to attempt to recover the information from the capsule. But they warn that the capsule can detect tampering and if they aren't careful, it is likely to be ruined.[BR][BR]What would you like to do?

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Turn it over to the {PLAYERFACTION:1} without tampering with it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Opens contact with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Attempt to recover the information on the capsule.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Evidence_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Science check: {STATCHANCE}% chance of success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_End_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_End_Dec
StringTable.String: "Thank you for returning the capsule to us. You have been a loyal ally through a sensitive time and your actions will not be forgotten."[BR][BR]"Please accept this small token of our gratitude."

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Understood.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_End_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You returned the capsule without tempering

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists are able to decrypt the capsule without setting off any safeguards.[BR][BR]It is a recording of the attack, but it shows that the attack was staged. The scientist is picked up by another ship before his ship is blown to bits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should discuss this with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists attempt to decrypt the capsule. At first they are successful and we have a few moments of sensor data and the image of the scientist in the ship.[BR][BR]Then a safeguard is tripped and the capsule destroys the data in a sad zap and the smell of ozone.[BR][BR]The data is gone and the capsule has obviously been tampered with. We don't have long to consider our options before the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are hailing us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Answer their hail.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Talk_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Talk_Dec
StringTable.String: "Our scouts reports that you have recovered the device. I trust that you have not tampered with it and are ready to turn it over to us."

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Talk_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We have investigated the device and the attack was staged.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_Talk_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We haven't tampered with the capsule and we are happy to give it to you. (lie)

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Talk_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Talk_Dec
StringTable.String: "Our scouts reports that you have recovered the device. I trust that you have not tempered with it and are ready to turn it over to us."

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Talk_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We tampered with the capsule and it destroyed itself.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_Talk_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The capsule was destroyed when we found it. (lie)

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_End_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_End_Dec
StringTable.String: "Your loyalty in this delicate matter will not be forgotten."

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Understood.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Success_End_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You returned the capsule to us

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_End_Name
StringTable.String: Investigation - Fail

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_End_Dec
StringTable.String: "You are a snake, as dishonest as you are incompetent."

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Close communications.

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: -3 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_Investigation_Fail_End_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: We are skeptical of your lies.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Name
StringTable.String: Pirate Threat

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Dec
StringTable.String: "Pirates are a threat to this sector and endanger both of our civilizations. Their recent attack on our colony ship cost us thousands of lives and they have been increasingly focused on our trading lanes."[BR][BR]"We will happily reward you for your help wiping them out."

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will consider our options.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Pirate Threat[/COLOR] Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We have been asked to help exterminate the pirates that threaten our sector.[BR][BR]Reward: 1000 Credits.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Destroy Pirate Fleets {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_End_Name
StringTable.String: Pirate Threat - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_End_Dec
StringTable.String: "Our citizens travel safely between worlds and the pirates have been beaten back, for now."[BR][BR]"Thank your captains for their work, and continue destroying the pirates when you encounter them."

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Safe hunting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} for 50 months

StringTable.Label: Quest_PirateThreat_End_Liberty_String0
StringTable.String: You countered the pirate threat

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorElevator_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Elevator

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorElevator_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_PrecursorElevator]Precursor Elevator[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorElevator_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Great news.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorElevator_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Precursor Elevator colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_OrbitalFactory_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Factory

StringTable.Label: Quest_OrbitalFactory_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalFactory]Orbital Factory[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OrbitalFactory_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Great news.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OrbitalFactory_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Orbital Factory colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrisonWorld_Name
StringTable.String: Prison World

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrisonWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_PrisonWorld]Prison World[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrisonWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_PrisonWorld]Prison World[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrisonWorld_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can build that in orbit of one of our planets.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PrisonWorld_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Prison World colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_TidalControl_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Control

StringTable.Label: Quest_TidalControl_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_TidalControl]Tidal Control[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TidalControl_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Great news.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TidalControl_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Tidal Control colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_MoistureGenerator_Name
StringTable.String: Moisture Generator

StringTable.Label: Quest_MoistureGenerator_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_MoistureGenerator]Moisture Generator[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MoistureGenerator_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Great news.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MoistureGenerator_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Moisture Generator colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThermalCore_Name
StringTable.String: Thermal Core

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThermalCore_Dec
StringTable.String: There isn't much of value among the debris and what is there is pitted and twisted by years of exposure to asteroids of varying sizes.[BR][BR]You do find the remains of an ancient freighter so battered it is impossible to tell what civilization it belonged to. The hull is nearly destroyed but inside you find a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade_ThermalCore]Thermal Core[/HS]. It is a [HS=HS_ColonyUpgrade]colony upgrade[/HS] that could still be deployed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThermalCore_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Great news.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ThermalCore_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Free Thermal Core colony upgrade

StringTable.Label: Quest_RecruitInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Recruits Available

StringTable.Label: Quest_RecruitInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: The most talented members of our population are ready to serve us as [HS=HS_Governor]governors[/HS], [HS=HS_Minister]ministers[/HS] and [HS=HS_Diplomat]diplomats[/HS].[BR][BR]We can recruit them and assign them to the positions we need them for, and they are most suited to do well in.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RecruitInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RecruitInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EOInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Executive Orders Available

StringTable.Label: Quest_EOInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: You wield incredible power as the head of our civilization. This is true in making long term plans in how a colony is to grow, where to explore and how and when to wage war.[BR][BR]But you can also force actions to happen immediately by using [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] to enact [HS=HS_ExecutiveOrders]Executive Orders[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Quest_EOInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EOInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TradeRouteInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Routes Available

StringTable.Label: Quest_TradeRouteInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: Other civilizations are eager to trade, which will benefit both of our empires. We can do this through diplomacy, or by building freighters in our shipyards and taking them to the planets of other civilizations to form trade routes.[BR][BR]Each trade route will require a [HS=HS_TradeLicensesMax]Trade License[/HS] which come from specializing a citizen into a Trader.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TradeRouteInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_TradeRouteInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_StarbaseInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Starbases Available

StringTable.Label: Quest_StarbaseInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: We battle for more than planets. If we are to thrive we must claim space itself, and the precious resources it provides.[BR][BR]Constructors are used to build Starbases. Military Starbases support our fleets and protect our borders. Economic Starbases boost nearby worlds and Communication Starbases extend our borders.

StringTable.Label: Quest_StarbaseInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_StarbaseInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomacyInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Meeting New Species

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomacyInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: We are not alone. Through diplomacy we can trade with civilizations, negotiate treaties, declare war and much more. Their opinion of us will depend on their individual personality and the way we have treated them.[BR][BR]If a relationship is particularly important to us we can assign one of our leaders as a [HS=HS_Diplomat]Diplomat[/HS] to that civilization.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomacyInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomacyInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PolicyInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Managing Your Government

StringTable.Label: Quest_PolicyInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: We can customize our government to our particular needs by adopting policies and setting our [HS=HS_Taxes]Tax Rate[/HS].[BR][BR]Early governments can't adopt many policies but through elections to more advanced forms of government we can unlock more [HS=HS_PolicySlot]Policy Slots[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Quest_PolicyInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_PolicyInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IdeologyInfo_Name
StringTable.String: Managing your Culture

StringTable.Label: Quest_IdeologyInfo_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization is as defined by its [HS=HS_Ideology]Ideology[/HS] as it is its technology and economy. Our civilization grows depending on the decisions we make. And as we earn [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Points[/HS] we can spend them on traits depending on our Ideology.[BR][BR]Citizens, Leaders and other Civilizations may have ideologies as well. And those that are aligned with ours may favor us, and those that are opposed may not.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IdeologyInfo_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Show me.

StringTable.Label: Quest_IdeologyInfo_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Not right now.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Name
StringTable.String: Oceanic Worlds

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Dec
StringTable.String: We will conquer dusty worlds of hard rock and open sky, but if we are to thrive we need to find new homes with deep oceans. Warm currents to soothe our eggs and cool depths to explore and hunt.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We will find new homes for our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Start a Mission

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: We will conquer dusty worlds of hard rock and open sky, but if we are to thrive we need to find new homes with deep oceans. Warm currents to sooth our eggs and cool depths to explore and hunt.[BR][BR]Reward: 1 [HS=HS_CulturePoint]Culture Point[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Colonize three Oceanic worlds {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_End_Name
StringTable.String: Oceanic Worlds - Success

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Our citizens celebrate as our spawn are born in welcoming oceans across the galaxy. Though each sea is filled with new life and discovery, we are a part of all of them.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OceanicWorlds_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are truly a galactic empire.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Name
StringTable.String: Khenpo Adar of the Burran

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Dec
StringTable.String: Blessed greetings, alien one. We have a small matter we could use your assistance with. The pirates in this region plague our people on their travels. Can you assist us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Burran have asked us to help exterminate the pirates that threaten their ships.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Burran and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Destroy Pirate Fleets {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Burran

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Name
StringTable.String: Khenpo Adar of the Burran

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Thank you, kindhearted alien. The rumors about your kind were true. As you have aided us, please allow us to aid you and your people as you face the rigors in your own lives.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_DiplomaticCapital]Diplomatic Capital[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Durantium would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_BURRAN_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Helios Ore per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Name
StringTable.String: Orphic Prime of the Orphica Enclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Dec
StringTable.String: Unconsolidated being, you may assist us/me and we/I will assist you. Provide us/me disassembled precursor sentinels for my/our inspection.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Orphica Enclave have asked us to gather components from Precursor Sentinel ships in the region.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Orphica Enclave and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Destroy Precursor Sentinel Fleets {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Orphica

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Name
StringTable.String: Orphic Prime of the Orphica Enclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your work is acknowledged, unconsolidated being. The Orphic Enclave shall assist you in various matters.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Tribute would be fitting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +3 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Thulium would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ORPHICA_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Hyper Silicates per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Name
StringTable.String: Golden Hellena of the Klepart

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Dec
StringTable.String: You, alien. Are you the ones we fear and hate? The ones who stole our children? Or are you better? Or worse? Can you help us find them? Survey anomalies in the area. Tell us what you find.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Klepart have asked us to help explore the galaxy and survey more anomalies.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Klepart and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Survey Anomalies {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Klepart

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Name
StringTable.String: Golden Hellena of the Klepart

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Dec
StringTable.String: You have done what we asked, when many aliens would not. We trust you, alien, and wish to make peace with you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_DiplomaticCapital]Diplomatic Capital[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Techapod Hives would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KLEPART_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Techapod Hive per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Name
StringTable.String: Keeper Quin of the Kaxx Collective

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Dec
StringTable.String: Hello. Your people have expertise in matters technological. Ones outside our knowledge. We have need for your wisdom. Could you complete a small project for us?

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Kaxx Collective have asked us to decipher strange writing found at the core of our world.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Kaxx Collective and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Research the Kaxx Cryptography technology

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Kaxx

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Name
StringTable.String: Keeper Quin of the Kaxx Collective

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Dec
StringTable.String: Your work has taught us much, and if what it says about the sacred being who dwells in our world is true, it augers well for the fate of the universe. We would like to work more with you in the future.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Our friendship will strengthen both of us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_DiplomaticCapital]Diplomatic Capital[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Xanthium Deposits would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_KAXX_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Xanthium Deposits per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Name
StringTable.String: Dustman Cole of the Odair Conclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Dec
StringTable.String: Do you know what we should do, alien? Destroy something beautiful. What's the point of it anyways? There are beasts in this region. Destroy them and I'll know you feel the same.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Odair Conclave have asked us to help exterminate the space monsters that threaten their ships.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Odair Conclave and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Destroy Space Monster Fleets {VALUE}/{AMOUNT}

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Odair

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Name
StringTable.String: Dustman Cole of the Odair Conclave

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Dec
StringTable.String: I'm not impressed alien, because nothing impresses me. But it's good to see you leave behind nothing where was there was something. I think we'll get along, during whatever time this universe has left.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Unquestioning obedience is all I ask.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +1 [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Tribute would be fitting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +3 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Antimatter would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_ODAIR_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Arnor Spice per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Name
StringTable.String: Isis Oddwater of the Lantern

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Dec
StringTable.String: Hey you, look. Here's the thing. We need Crucible Vapors. We don't want it. We need it. Help us, and we'll think about starting to help you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Yes. We will do it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Start Mission[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Liberty_QuestDescription
StringTable.String: The Lantern have asked us to help to build a plant that produces an addictive substance, Crucible Vapors.[BR][BR]Reward: Alliance with the Lantern and 1 Culture Point

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Liberty_ObjectiveDisplayName1
StringTable.String: Build a Crucible Lab improvement

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I will consider it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: No effect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: I don't serve you. You serve me, prepare for war.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Declare War on the Lantern

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Name
StringTable.String: Isis Oddwater of the Lantern

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Dec
StringTable.String: You did it. That's amazing. We are on board with what you're doing and how you're doing it.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Allow your scientists to collaborate with ours.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Liberty_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +2 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Equality_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Tribute would be fitting.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +3 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Authority_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Regular shipments of your Harmony Crystals would be appreciated.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MC_LANTERN_End_Authority_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +0.2 Harmony Crystal per [HS=HS_Week]Month[/HS]
